solution_line_template: If Kristoff has {kristoff_stickers} stickers, Riku has {riku_multiplier} * {kristoff_stickers} stickers = <<{kristoff_stickers}*{riku_multiplier}={riku_extra_stickers}>>{riku_extra_stickers} more stickers.

The total number of stickers Riku has is {riku_extra_stickers} stickers + {kristoff_stickers} stickers = <<{riku_extra_stickers}+{kristoff_stickers}={riku_total_stickers}>>{riku_total_stickers} stickers
